thread.section_title: Radisson Blu Edwardian Vanderbilt - UPDATED 2017 Hotel Reviews & Price Comparison (London, England) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: Newly renovated rooms are gorgeous!
thread.title_full: Newly renovated rooms are gorgeous! - Review of Radisson Blu Edwardian Vanderbilt, London, England - TripAdvisor

author: Max C
title: Newly renovated rooms are gorgeous!
text: It's my third time staying at this hotel, I love it. New room decorations are cool with grey and yellow-accent colours scheme, very nice (much better than the old red bedcover and carpet lol). Breakfast was still great in quality, variety and taste .. too bad they removed my favourite super delicious muffin from buffet.
